Parameters: MediaSync: The MediaSync the error pertains to This value must never be null.
int: The type of error that has occurred: MediaSync.MEDIASYNC_ERROR_AUDIOTRACK_FAIL MediaSync.MEDIASYNC_ERROR_SURFACE_FAIL
int: an extra code, specific to the error. Typically implementation dependent.
onError(android.media.MediaSync,int,int).FullName: public abstract void onError (MediaSync sync, int what, int extra)

onError(android.media.MediaSync, int, in.FullName: public abstract void onError (MediaSync sync, int what, int extra)

ClassDesc: Interface definition of a callback to be invoked when there has been an error during an asynchronous operation (other errors will throw exceptions at method call time).
